title: As Commodity Prices Sink, Mining Equipment Makers Suffer
teaser: Lower prices for minerals like copper and iron ore may be good news for car makers and other manufacturers. But Caterpillar and other companies making the huge equipment used to dig these minerals are seeing weaker demand. There have been many layoffs and more are expected.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
